data.name: Site Backup
data.body: <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to open this task:</span></strong></span><span style="text-decoration: none"><strong> </strong>As soon as we have hosting/cPanel access. <strong>For Shopify</strong>, please close this task right away. </span></p> <div align="left"> <p><br /><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>Goal:</strong></span>  Create a backup in case someone goes wrong and we need to revert to the previous website version. We also use the site backup to create a test environment for development.<br /><br /></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>Instructions:</strong></span><br /><strong>ON PM: </strong></p> <ol> <li> <p>Before assigning this task make sure the site access logins are in the workbook</p> </li> </ol> <br /> <p><strong>On  <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> </strong></p> <ol> <li> <p>Link to the backup zip file on GDrive (containing all folders and database SQL)</p> </li> </ol> <br /> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>When to Close:</strong></span> When FED shares a link to site backup in Google Drive. </p> <p><br /><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline">Link to Manual:</span></strong> <a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.acvi577rfsy0" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="text-decoration: underline">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.acvi577rfsy0</span></a> </p> <br /> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>Link to Tutorial</strong></span><strong>: </strong>TBD</p> </div>
data.notes: Confirm with Bidur sir

data.name: Configure Development Environment
data.body: <p><span style="text-decoration: underline">Task Description</span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to open this task</span><span style="text-decoration: none">: </span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">AFTER we have full access to the site (hosting &amp; CMS) </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">BEFORE doing any dev work on the site</span></p> </li> </ul> <p><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: underline">Goal:</span><span style="text-decoration: none"> </span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none">Create a development environment using a copy of their existing site where the website changes &amp; fixes can be tested before moving to the production (live) environment.</span><strong><br /></strong></p> <p> </p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline">Instructions:</span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">ON PM: </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Before assigning this task to Frontend Team, please provide the following:</span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Provide URL of live domain</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Specify which CMS it is (i.e. Custom backend, WP, WP+Woocommerce, Magento1, Magento2, etc.) </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">As we are copying the existing live site on the dev environment, make sure the site access is in the workbook before assigning this task.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Inform FED if the client has their own developers so that Collaboration Flow information can be documented internally. </span></p> </li> </ol> </li> </ol> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">On Frontend Dev: </span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none">If the client is on Wordpress: </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Create SmartWebsiteDesign.com Subdomain URL &amp; cPanel </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Create Git Repo </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Make sure the dev site  is blocked via robots.txt &amp; is not being tracked with GA.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Comment accordingly with the deliverables, and add it to the Workbook [Logins] tab </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Disable Pro/Premium plugins on our dev site. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Reactivate the Pro &amp; Premium plugins with the proper licensing</span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">For plugins where Smartsites has unlimited licenses or licenses that can be used for clients  (eg. Gravity form, WP Rocket etc.) please use this license for the dev site </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If sharable licenses are not available, please request for the PM/client to provide the plugin licensing details. The client may need to purchase additional licenses to use on the dev site. </span></p> </li> </ol> </li> </ol> </li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Note: The purpose of the dev site is to test changes on an environment which is as similar to the client’s live site as possible. Missing plugins licenses may cause inaccuracies in testing, so we strongly advise to address all licensing issues ASAP. </span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: none"> </span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If the client is on another CMS: </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Follow the CMS-specific guide </span><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/16Z8LoUr6jhyHTDkQ9LQfxlIB65J6RlMJ3QWhhTezkvo/edit?tab=t.0" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="text-decoration: underline">here</span></a><span style="text-decoration: none">. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If the client’s CMS is not already represented in the guide, please research solutions and discuss with the PM. Once a solution is decided, add the procedure to the guide for future reference. </span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /><br /></span></p> </li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to Close: </span><span style="text-decoration: underline"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none">When development environment is created and logged in the workbook</span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: underline">Link to Manual: </span><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.7yewl7f6d2fn" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="text-decoration: underline">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.7yewl7f6d2fn</span></a><span style="text-decoration: none"> </span></p>
data.notes: Confirm with Bidur sir

data.name: Backlink Health Check
data.body: <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to open this task?</span></h3> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Immediately</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">A similar task will automatically open quarterly  </span></p> </li> </ul> <h3><strong> </strong></h3> <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline">Goal:</span></h3> <h3><span style="text-decoration: none">Maintain a healthy backlink profile for the client</span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /><br /></span></h3> <h3><span style="text-decoration: none">On <span class="mention mention-user">Inbound Marketing Team</span> </span></h3> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Fill out the broken links tab in the link building sheet &amp; advise next steps.</span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Broken Internal Links - Advise PM how to fix the link, and if details/clarification is needed from client be sure to request this information. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Broken External Links - Advise PM how to fix the link, and if details/clarification is needed from client be sure to request this information. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Broken Page With Backlink - Advise PM how to fix the link, and if details/clarification is needed from client be sure to request this information. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Lost Links- Attempt to reacquire any Lost Links that are worth pursuing. If not, please provide the reason. </span></p> </li> </ul> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Check for spammy backlinks to disavow &amp; advise next steps. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Comment with the sheet and </span><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/19PLtR50GgO8t2QpN72Kj2jMdmda-5_Nt0P4kYb4TQtc/edit#heading=h.xlt09odanqlj" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="text-decoration: underline">clear instructions for the PM</span></a><span style="text-decoration: none"> on next steps. </span></p> </li> </ol> <h3><span style="text-decoration: none"> </span></h3> <h3><span style="text-decoration: none">On PM</span></h3> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Review the list of broken links</span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">For the tabs, broken internal links, broken external links, and broken page with backlinks please task this out to the <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If there are items found for the Lost Links tab, then task this out to the <span class="mention mention-user">Inbound Marketing Team</span> to get back.</span></p> </li> </ul> </li> <li><span style="text-decoration: none">Review the spammy backlink list. Provide <span class="mention mention-user">Inbound Marketing Team</span> feedback or approve to disavow<br /></span></li> </ol> <br /> <h3><strong> </strong></h3> <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to close </span></h3> <ul> <li> <p>Broken Links - FED &amp; IBM will confirm links have been resolved</p> </li> <li> <p>Spammy Links - IBM will provide a screenshot of the submitted disavow file. Once submitted there is no further action needed.</p> </li> <li> <p>After resolving broken links and spammy backlinks.</p> </li> </ul>
data.notes: Check if updating in one place resolves all the issues at once. Reset the due date saying "The site's bandwidth issue has been resolved so we are proceeding with the task."

data.name: Mobile Speed Optimization *O*
data.body: <span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>When to open this task: </strong></span><br /> <ul> <li><span style="text-decoration: none">AFTER Website Audit fixes </span></li> <li><span style="text-decoration: none">IF additional page speed optimizations are still needed</span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /><br /></span></li> </ul> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline">Goal: </span></strong><span style="text-decoration: none"><strong> </strong>To optimize the mobile page speed issues</span></p> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline">Instructions:</span><span style="text-decoration: none">  </span></strong></p> <p> </p> <p><strong> <span style="text-decoration: none">On <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span>  [1:2]</span></strong></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Please always do these points:</span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Unload third-party resources on mobile.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Optimize the images, videos, compressing them and implementing caching.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Separate image size for mobile and desktop by using image srcset </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Use responsive image offered by WordPress (Image srcset)</span></p> </li> </ul> </li> </ol> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: none">On PM </span></strong></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Review the pagespeed after Frontend’s optimizations. If further improvements are still desired, changes to content is required. Please advise the following, and reassign to Frontend Dev. </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Confirm if it's okay to use different content on desktop and mobile.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If yes to point 1, please indicate which content should show up ONLY on desktop and not on mobile (Consult with client if needed). If mobile is more than 2 or 2.5 folds, we would suggest omitting any less important content.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Please advise If we should add Lazy load resources/sections below the second fold.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If we should have a different design layout for mobile, open up a mobile design mockup task for the homepage and any other complex/very important pages, i.e. if you have a complex design layout, for example if it has a lot of elements, sections and/or dynamic parts.</span></p> </li> </ol> </li> </ol> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: none">On <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> [2:2]</span></strong><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none">Upon PM approval (see below list) please do:</span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Separate Mobile content (Such as Image, videos according to viewport size. )</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Remove unnecessary blocks/ sections on mobile</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Implement Lazy loading</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Implement a separate Design Layout that supports mobile page speed.</span></p> </li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>When to Close:</strong> </span><span style="text-decoration: none">Once optimal page speed is achieved, or we exhausted all efforts within the limitations.</span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span></p> <p> </p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>Link to Manual:</strong></span> <a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.5suyzgindjtf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.5suyzgindjtf</a></p>
data.notes: Analyze and give estimation first. Check if we have all access also.

data.name: Redirects Setup - Live Site *R*
data.body: <p><strong>Goal</strong>: Set up planned redirects as on the dev site on the live site as well.</p> <strong>Deliverable(s):</strong><br />On FED: Set up planned redirects on the live site as per the dev site. Once done, reassign to IBM to run the crawl.<em><br /></em>On IBM to provide:<br />- a list of old URLs and their crawl result that should show all have a 301 status with the new redirect URLs (by screaming frog).<br />- a summary of a website crawl (by screaming frog) indicating no 404 pages were found.<br /><br /><strong>Checklist:</strong> <p>On IBM: Check the redirects set-ups done from FED on the live site and see if any URLs are missing that need to be added to the list or need to be corrected. Reassign to FED in case anything is still missing.<br />On PM: Open this task on FED immediately after the site launch.</p>
data.notes: Just comment

data.name: Form Testing &amp; SMTP
data.body: <div class="rich_text"> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>When to Open: <br /></strong></span><span style="text-decoration: none">AFTER the Website Tracking task is completed<br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none">REOPEN IF changes are made to forms or new forms are introduced</span></p> <p><span></span></p> <p> </p> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline">Goal:</span> E</strong>nsure proper sending, receipt &amp; conversion tracking for all forms on the website.</p> <p> </p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>Instructions: </strong></span></p> <p><strong>On <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> </strong></p> <ol> <li>List of all separate forms on the website (duplicate occurrences of the same form are not needed) including fields and recipient email address(es). Make sure this matches with the form recipient per the Workbook. </li> <li>Send a test submission on each form to the client’s recipient email and a test FED email. Confirm receipt  of email in FED email with screenshot &amp; check with PM that client has also received on their end.</li> <li>Check that the form submission conversion event is recorded correctly.  </li> </ol> <br /> <p><strong>On PM</strong></p> <ol> <li>Confirm form fields and receipt of test email with client. </li> <li>If there are no issues, this task can be closed. </li> <li>If the client cannot receive the test form submissions, acquire SMTP email logins &amp; assign them to FED to implement SMTP. (2FA should be disabled) </li> <li>If the form is not properly tracked as a conversion event (and should be) please open or re-open the Website Tracking task.</li> </ol> <br /> <p><strong>IF initial form testing was not successful, on <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span>:</strong></p> <ol> <li>Setup SMTP, or if SMTP is not possible, setup client email to use as sender/receiver.</li> <li>Resend test email. Confirm receipt from client &amp; recheck conversion tracking. </li> </ol> <br /> <p>List of Extensions:</p> <p>Wordpress, WP Mail SMTP by WPForms: <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-mail-smtp/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-mail-smtp/</a></p> <p>Magento 2, Magento 2 SMTP Extension (MagePal): <a href="https://github.com/magepal/magento2-gmail-smtp-app" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://github.com/magepal/magento2-gmail-smtp-app</a></p> <br /> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>When to close the task: </strong></span></p> <p>When the client has confirmed receipt of form submissions to the correct email address. </p> <p> </p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline">Link to Manual:</span> <a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.mzc21w80hle5" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.mzc21w80hle5</a></p> <p><br /><span style="text-decoration: underline">Link to Tutorial: </span>TBD</p> </div>

data.name: Malware Cleaning *O*
data.body: <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline"><span style="text-decoration: underline">Goal</span></span></strong><span style="text-decoration: none"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline">:</span></strong> To clean malware from sites. This is a non-billable version of the task, to be used for clients who DO have maintenance services. </span></p> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline"><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to open this task:</span></span></strong><span style="text-decoration: none"><strong> </strong>When malware is suspected on the website <strong>and </strong>the client has a maintenance plan</span></p> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline"><span style="text-decoration: underline">Instructions:</span><span style="text-decoration: underline"> </span></span></strong></p> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: none">I. On PM</span></strong></p> <ol> <li>Please list the website URL as well as any concerns/indicators as to why there might be malware on the site and assign this task to FED. <ul> <li><span style="text-decoration: none">Always use the high priority checkbox + 24hour label for the initial phase of this task.</span></li> <li>NOTE: Issues will not get fixed in search results right away after the malware is cleaned, this will need to be reviewed from Google’s end. Usually GSC reviews the websites after submitting within 48 hrs, however, sometimes they take longer, and we can not control it from our end, since it is the process of the Google Services.</li> </ul> </li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: none"> </span></p> <p><strong>II. On <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> </strong></p> <p> </p> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Please scan the site with multiple tools to check the site for malware and clean any malicious activity. Once done please also check GSC to ensure no security issues are appearing on that end either.</span></p> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Checklist for  <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Clean the malware using the guide (</span><a href="https://github.com/smart-sites/developer-guides/blob/master/malware-cleanup.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="text-decoration: none">https://github.com/smart-sites/developer-guides/blob/master/malware-cleanup.md</span></a><span style="text-decoration: none">).</span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">1.1 Attach any reports of the tools from pt. 1 you used.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">1.2 Make note of any url patterns related to the malware, as these will be helpful for Malware Indexing Cleanup later. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">1.3 Launch GSC security check (it will take some time).</span></p> </li> </ul> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Launch any  specific checks that were mentioned in the task and were not done in pt. </span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">2.1 Review cron jobs.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">2.2 Review CMS admin/employee users.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">2.3 Change CMS passwords for all admin/employee users. Update in WB.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">2.4 Change hosting passwords (cpanel/FTP/etc). Update in WB.</span></p> </li> </ul> </li> </ol> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: none">III. On <span class="mention mention-user">Backend Dev Team</span> (in case the hosting is t35) *O*</span></strong></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Review SSH keys.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Reset all running processes for the account.<br /><br /></span></p> </li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Notes on the checklist</span></p> <ul> <li><span style="text-decoration: none">All points should be commented on the task. I.e. You removed some entity, changed password, or need to confirm the suspicious entity - comment everything for the client to know and future reference.</span></li> <li>Review entity means <ul> <li>Remove the malware entity</li> <li>List all other records for the client to confirm.</li> </ul> </li> </ul> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to Close: </span></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="text-decoration: none">If client has T35 Hosting - After Backend Team confirms all malware has been removed and no further action is needed. </span></li> <li>If client doesn't have T35 Hosting - After Frontend Team confirms all malware has been removed and no further action is needed.</li> </ul> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><span style="text-decoration: underline">Link to Manual: </span></span><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.s07t6fmb4rzj" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="text-decoration: underline">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.s07t6fmb4rzj</span></a></p>
data.notes: High Priority treat as 24hr, check if maintenance is available

data.name: Backlink Health Check
data.body: <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to open this task?</span></h3> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Immediately</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">A similar task will automatically open quarterly  </span></p> </li> </ul> <h3><strong> </strong></h3> <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline">Goal:</span></h3> <h3><span style="text-decoration: none">Maintain a healthy backlink profile for the client</span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /><br /></span></h3> <h3><span style="text-decoration: none">On <span class="mention mention-user">Inbound Marketing Team</span> </span></h3> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Fill out the broken links tab in the link building sheet &amp; advise next steps.</span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Broken Internal Links - Advise PM how to fix the link, and if details/clarification is needed from client be sure to request this information. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Broken External Links - Advise PM how to fix the link, and if details/clarification is needed from client be sure to request this information. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Broken Page With Backlink - Advise PM how to fix the link, and if details/clarification is needed from client be sure to request this information. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Lost Links- Attempt to reacquire any Lost Links that are worth pursuing. If not, please provide the reason. </span></p> </li> </ul> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Check for spammy backlinks to disavow &amp; advise next steps. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Comment with the sheet and </span><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/19PLtR50GgO8t2QpN72Kj2jMdmda-5_Nt0P4kYb4TQtc/edit#heading=h.xlt09odanqlj" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="text-decoration: underline">clear instructions for the PM</span></a><span style="text-decoration: none"> on next steps. </span></p> </li> </ol> <h3><span style="text-decoration: none"> </span></h3> <h3><span style="text-decoration: none">On PM</span></h3> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Review the list of broken links</span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">For the tabs, broken internal links, broken external links, and broken page with backlinks please task this out to the <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If there are items found for the Lost Links tab, then task this out to the <span class="mention mention-user">Inbound Marketing Team</span> to get back.</span></p> </li> </ul> </li> <li><span style="text-decoration: none">Review the spammy backlink list. Provide <span class="mention mention-user">Inbound Marketing Team</span> feedback or approve to disavow<br /></span></li> </ol> <br /> <h3><strong> </strong></h3> <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to close </span></h3> <ul> <li> <p>Broken Links - FED &amp; IBM will confirm links have been resolved</p> </li> <li> <p>Spammy Links - IBM will provide a screenshot of the submitted disavow file. Once submitted there is no further action needed.</p> </li> <li> <p>After resolving broken links and spammy backlinks.</p> </li> </ul>

Make sure we have all access first, if yes then proceed.

data.name: Mobile Speed Optimization *O*
data.body: <span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>When to open this task: </strong></span><br /> <ul> <li><span style="text-decoration: none">AFTER Website Audit fixes </span></li> <li><span style="text-decoration: none">IF additional page speed optimizations are still needed</span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /><br /></span></li> </ul> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline">Goal: </span></strong><span style="text-decoration: none"><strong> </strong>To optimize the mobile page speed issues</span></p> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline">Instructions:</span><span style="text-decoration: none">  </span></strong></p> <p> </p> <p><strong> <span style="text-decoration: none">On <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span>  [1:2]</span></strong></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Please always do these points:</span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Unload third-party resources on mobile.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Optimize the images, videos, compressing them and implementing caching.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Separate image size for mobile and desktop by using image srcset </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Use responsive image offered by WordPress (Image srcset)</span></p> </li> </ul> </li> </ol> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: none">On PM </span></strong></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Review the pagespeed after Frontend’s optimizations. If further improvements are still desired, changes to content is required. Please advise the following, and reassign to Frontend Dev. </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Confirm if it's okay to use different content on desktop and mobile.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If yes to point 1, please indicate which content should show up ONLY on desktop and not on mobile (Consult with client if needed). If mobile is more than 2 or 2.5 folds, we would suggest omitting any less important content.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Please advise If we should add Lazy load resources/sections below the second fold.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If we should have a different design layout for mobile, open up a mobile design mockup task for the homepage and any other complex/very important pages, i.e. if you have a complex design layout, for example if it has a lot of elements, sections and/or dynamic parts.</span></p> </li> </ol> </li> </ol> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><strong><span style="text-decoration: none">On <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> [2:2]</span></strong><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none">Upon PM approval (see below list) please do:</span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Separate Mobile content (Such as Image, videos according to viewport size. )</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Remove unnecessary blocks/ sections on mobile</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Implement Lazy loading</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Implement a separate Design Layout that supports mobile page speed.</span></p> </li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>When to Close:</strong> </span><span style="text-decoration: none">Once optimal page speed is achieved, or we exhausted all efforts within the limitations.</span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span></p> <p> </p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>Link to Manual:</strong></span> <a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.5suyzgindjtf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.5suyzgindjtf</a></p>
data.notes: Analyze and give estimation first. Check the login access as well.

data.name: Cant Access Login
data.body: <p>Hi <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> ,</p> <p> </p> <p><a href="https://nfcacademy.com/wp-admin/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://nfcacademy.com/wp-admin/</a></p> <p> </p> <p>Client and I are both receiving this:</p> <p> </p> <h1>This page isn’t working</h1> <p><strong>nfcacademy.com</strong> redirected you too many times.</p> <div> <p> </p> <ul class="single-suggestion"> <li><a href="https://support.google.com/chrome?p=rl_error&amp;hl=en-US" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Try deleting your cookies</a>.</li> </ul> </div> <p> </p> <div class="error-code">ERR_TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS</div>
data.notes: Seems like malware do a malware scan

data.name: add opt-in text box to application form
data.body: <p>hi <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> </p> <p>the client would like to add an optional field onto their application forms for applicants to opt-in to text messaging </p> <p> </p> <p><strong>REMOVE</strong>: (directly under income per month)</p> <p>"By Submitting the form, you are agreeing to opt-in for our system to send you SMS messages." </p> <p> </p> <p><strong>REMOVE</strong>: (within current required checkbox section above submit)</p> <p>"By checking this box, you are agreeing to receive recurring messages from Desert Rock Capital related to your request submission. Message frequency varies per user. Text "STOP" to unsubscribe, or "HELP" for help. Msg &amp; Data rates may apply.</p> <p> </p> <p><em>required field should be: "By checking this box, you are agreeing to the Terms of Service of Desert Rock Capital." </em></p> <p> </p> <p><strong>ADD NEW CHECKBOX</strong>: (under required field but above submit)</p> <p>"(Optional) By checking this box, you are agreeing to receive recurring messages from Desert Rock Capital related to your request submission. Message frequency varies per user. Text "STOP" to unsubscribe, or "HELP" for help. Msg &amp; Data rates may apply."</p> <p> </p> <p><img src="/proxy.php?proxy=forward_thumbnail&module=system&invalidate=aa84d14bc5afe7a0b2b62ad010d476eb151ac7dd&context=upload&name=2025-03%2F146809-Dt3ndOaFWqkFBy827jv2RKq3G2HV6tfBZCSAIOEw&original_file_name=image.png&width=500&height=300&ver=191174&scale=scale&crop=1" alt="image.png" image-type="attachment" object-id="259092" /></p> <p> </p> <p>thank you </p>

data.name: Site Backup
data.body: <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to open this task:</span></strong></span><span style="text-decoration: none"><strong> </strong>As soon as we have hosting/cPanel access. <strong>For Shopify</strong>, please close this task right away. </span></p> <div align="left"> <p><br /><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>Goal:</strong></span>  Create a backup in case someone goes wrong and we need to revert to the previous website version. We also use the site backup to create a test environment for development.<br /><br /></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>Instructions:</strong></span><br /><strong>ON PM: </strong></p> <ol> <li> <p>Before assigning this task make sure the site access logins are in the workbook</p> </li> </ol> <br /> <p><strong>On  <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> </strong></p> <ol> <li> <p>Link to the backup zip file on GDrive (containing all folders and database SQL)</p> </li> </ol> <br /> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>When to Close:</strong></span> When FED shares a link to site backup in Google Drive. </p> <p><br /><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline">Link to Manual:</span></strong> <a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.acvi577rfsy0" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="text-decoration: underline">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.acvi577rfsy0</span></a> </p> <br /> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>Link to Tutorial</strong></span><strong>: </strong>TBD</p> </div>

data.name: Configure Development Environment
data.body: <p><span style="text-decoration: underline">Task Description</span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to open this task</span><span style="text-decoration: none">: </span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">AFTER we have full access to the site (hosting &amp; CMS) </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">BEFORE doing any dev work on the site</span></p> </li> </ul> <p><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: underline">Goal:</span><span style="text-decoration: none"> </span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none">Create a development environment using a copy of their existing site where the website changes &amp; fixes can be tested before moving to the production (live) environment.</span><strong><br /></strong></p> <p> </p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline">Instructions:</span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">ON PM: </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Before assigning this task to Frontend Team, please provide the following:</span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Provide URL of live domain</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Specify which CMS it is (i.e. Custom backend, WP, WP+Woocommerce, Magento1, Magento2, etc.) </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">As we are copying the existing live site on the dev environment, make sure the site access is in the workbook before assigning this task.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Inform FED if the client has their own developers so that Collaboration Flow information can be documented internally. </span></p> </li> </ol> </li> </ol> <p><strong> </strong></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">On Frontend Dev: </span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none">If the client is on Wordpress: </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Create SmartWebsiteDesign.com Subdomain URL &amp; cPanel </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Create Git Repo </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Make sure the dev site  is blocked via robots.txt &amp; is not being tracked with GA.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Comment accordingly with the deliverables, and add it to the Workbook [Logins] tab </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Disable Pro/Premium plugins on our dev site. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Reactivate the Pro &amp; Premium plugins with the proper licensing</span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">For plugins where Smartsites has unlimited licenses or licenses that can be used for clients  (eg. Gravity form, WP Rocket etc.) please use this license for the dev site </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If sharable licenses are not available, please request for the PM/client to provide the plugin licensing details. The client may need to purchase additional licenses to use on the dev site. </span></p> </li> </ol> </li> </ol> </li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Note: The purpose of the dev site is to test changes on an environment which is as similar to the client’s live site as possible. Missing plugins licenses may cause inaccuracies in testing, so we strongly advise to address all licensing issues ASAP. </span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: none"> </span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If the client is on another CMS: </span></p> <ol> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">Follow the CMS-specific guide </span><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/16Z8LoUr6jhyHTDkQ9LQfxlIB65J6RlMJ3QWhhTezkvo/edit?tab=t.0" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="text-decoration: underline">here</span></a><span style="text-decoration: none">. </span></p> </li> <li> <p><span style="text-decoration: none">If the client’s CMS is not already represented in the guide, please research solutions and discuss with the PM. Once a solution is decided, add the procedure to the guide for future reference. </span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none"><br /><br /></span></p> </li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline">When to Close: </span><span style="text-decoration: underline"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: none">When development environment is created and logged in the workbook</span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline"><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: underline">Link to Manual: </span><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.7yewl7f6d2fn" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="text-decoration: underline">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Da2PcJZ_pCLqTdQIiUTECN5tYshVaQdA84Vr9WSNiOk/edit#heading=h.7yewl7f6d2fn</span></a><span style="text-decoration: none"> </span></p>

data.name: AccessiBe Implementation
data.body: <p>Hi <span class="mention mention-user">Frontend Dev Team</span> <br /><br /></p> <p><span>Client has purchased the AccessiBe plugin and is asking for us to implement. Instructions below:</span></p> <p><span> </span></p> <p><span> </span></p> <p><span>NavaDerm Partners LLC has sent you instructions for installing accessWidget. For best results, paste the installation code we provided into your webpage’s HTML, right before the closing body tag.</span></p> <p><span>‘&lt;/body&gt;’</span></p> <p> </p> <p><span>We’ve put together installation guides for popular site builders like WordPress and Shopify.</span></p> <p><span> </span></p> <p><span>&lt;script&gt; (function(){ var s = document.createElement('script'); var h = document.querySelector('head') || document.body; s.src = '<a href="https://acsbapp.com/apps/app/dist/js/app.js" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://acsbapp.com/apps/app/dist/js/app.js</a>'; s.async = true; s.onload = function(){ acsbJS.init(); }; h.appendChild(s); })(); &lt;/script&gt;</span></p> <p> </p>

data.name: SMTP Email Integration
data.body: <strong>Goal:</strong> Set up SMTP to ensure emails are successfully going through for website contact forms.<br /><br /><strong>Checklist:</strong><br />1. SMTP email sender is set up<br />2. Contact form receivers are set-up for each form<br />3. If SMTP is not possible, share client email to use as sender/receiver<br /><br /><strong>List of Extensions:</strong><br />Wordpress, WP Mail SMTP by WPForms: <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-mail-smtp/">https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-mail-smtp/</a> <br />Magento 2, Magento 2 SMTP Extension (MagePal): <a href="https://github.com/magepal/magento2-gmail-smtp-app">https://github.com/magepal/magento2-gmail-smtp-app</a><br /><br /><strong>On PM:</strong> Get needed email logins from the client (make sure mobile verification is off).
data.notes: comment reagrdaing there availabilty
